Topple Information

Swipe at a creature to knock it Prone. 1d4Bludgeoning Type: Action 1 turn Melee DEX Save Attack Roll Short Rest Range: 1.5 m

How to unlock Topple

Can be unlocked by: Mourning Frost

Topple Tips & Notes

Excellent for characters that don't want to be in melee since a prone enemy can't use reactions when you try to run away
